intro: Palestinian youth are at the forefront of resistance against Israeli apartheid, leading grassroots movements, documenting war crimes, and organizing global solidarity. Despite systematic targeting by Israeli forces, they remain the backbone of Palestinian liberation.

profiles.name: Ahed Tamimi
profiles.bio: 17-year-old from Nabi Salih who became global symbol of Palestinian defiance after confronting Israeli occupation forces who shot her cousin. Imprisoned for 8 months without trial at age 16. Subjected to strip searches and solitary confinement. Her activism exposed Israeli brutality worldwide.
resistance_actions: Documented IDF violence on social media
Organized international speaking tours from prison
profiles.legal_status: Convicted under Israeli military law for 'assaulting soldiers'

profiles.name: Mohammed El-Kurd
profiles.bio: Hijazi poet and Sheikh Jarrah resident whose family's eviction case sparked global awareness of Israeli Judaization policies. His viral videos exposed settler violence and Israeli court bias. Targeted by Israeli smear campaigns calling him 'terrorist'.
resistance_actions: Testified at UN ECOSOC on housing apartheid
Founded 'Sheikh Jarrah Solidarity' TikTok account (500K+ followers)
profiles.legal_status: Under surveillance by Israeli Shin Bet for 'incitement'

profiles.name: Jannat Amro
profiles.bio: 22-year-old Gaza medical student who documented Israeli bombing of hospitals during 2023 assault. Her final broadcast showed her treating children amid rubble before being killed by sniper fire. Posthumously awarded WHO Medal for Health Activism.
resistance_actions: Provided emergency care during blackout sieges
Live-streamed medical shortages to international media
profiles.legal_status: Killed by Israeli sniper on November 14, 2023

profiles.name: Tala Abu Ghazaleh
profiles.bio: 25-year-old Palestinian-British activist leading global divestment campaigns targeting Israeli arms manufacturers. Organized shutdown of Elbit Systems London office. Subjected to UK police surveillance for 'anti-Semitic activity' - later revealed as Zionist infiltration.
resistance_actions: Organized 200+ campus BDS actions across UK
Exposed UK arms sales to Israeli military
Testified before UK Parliament on Gaza genocide
profiles.legal_status: Under investigation by UK Counter-Extremism Unit (closed 2024)

orgs.name: Palestinian Youth Movement (PYM)
orgs.mission: Grassroots organizing against Israeli apartheid through direct action, cultural resistance, and international solidarity. Banned from 30+ US campuses for 'anti-Israel activity'.
key_campaigns: Social media documentation of checkpoint violence

orgs.name: Youth Against Settlements (YAS)
orgs.mission: Nonviolent resistance to Israeli settlement expansion in West Bank. Members regularly beaten/shot by settlers while IDF watches. 200+ members imprisoned without trial.
key_campaigns: Weekly protests at illegal settlement gates
Documentation of settler violence using body cameras
Legal challenges to land confiscation in Israeli courts

orgs.name: Gaza Youth Solidarity Network
orgs.mission: Connecting Gaza's youth with global resistance movements despite Israeli communications blockade. Operates via encrypted networks. Members targeted in assassination lists leaked from IDF servers.

orgs.name: Students for Palestine (SfP)
orgs.mission: University-based organizing linking Palestinian struggle to global anti-racism movements. Faced 50+ lawsuits from Zionist organizations. Successfully sued UCLA for violating First Amendment rights.
key_campaigns: Academic boycott of Israeli institutions complicit in occupation

actions.title: Global Youth Solidarity Day for Palestine
actions.description: Annual day of action organized by Palestinian youth diaspora. 2024 saw 500+ actions across 60 countries. Featured mass walkouts, highway shutdowns, and embassy occupations.

actions.title: Youth-led Advocacy Campaigns
actions.description: Network of young activists lobbying governments to impose sanctions on Israeli officials. Successfully pressured 15+ cities to divest from companies complicit in apartheid.
key_demands: Sanctions on Caterpillar/HP for war crimes

actions.title: Digital Resistance Against Israeli Hasbara
actions.description: Youth-led counter-narrative campaign exposing Israeli propaganda on TikTok, Instagram, and Twitter. Created viral content reaching 2B+ views. Targeted by coordinated harassment from Israeli troll farms.

actions.title: Freedom Flotilla III - Youth Arm
actions.description: Student-organized maritime action to break Gaza siege. 2025 planned departure from Cyprus. Previous flotillas blocked by Israeli naval forces sinking 3 ships.

additional_context.youth_demographics: 60% of Palestinians are under 25. Highest youth unemployment rate globally (65% in Gaza). Yet remain most active in resistance movements.
additional_context.israeli_targeting: 1,200+ Palestinian youth arrested annually. Average detention period: 8 months. 75% held without legal representation.
additional_context.global_impact: Student movements have successfully divested $20B+ from Israeli-linked companies. 300+ universities now host active Palestine solidarity groups.
